ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: Good point. The only good thing I thought of for corpse runs was that you can be summoned back to your corpse so you don t have to make the trek to wherever
ygData.messageBody:
Good point. The only good thing I thought of for corpse runs was that you
can be summoned back to your corpse so you don't have to make the trek to
wherever you died all over again. But yeah, if you can't find your corpse
it's a royal pain.
Would you have it so you have all your gear but can still be rezzed? or
would you just eliminate rezzes?
luv,
-Su

> > Or, if you could go back in time and change something about Everquest
> > during
> > it's creation to have certain features, what would you have done
> > differently?
> >
>
> Definitely I would get rid of the corpse-hunting. I understand losing exp
> when you die, I think that's a good thing (well not GOOD but it makes
sense) but
> going back to find your body to get all your stuff back just sucks.
Especially
> when you die somewhere you can't get back to. WHY can't you ever find a
necro
> when you need one?
>
>
> "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
>
